item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>I know exactly what you mean Matthew. We had a real problem with season 1 being on Sunday evenings as we always ended the weekend going to bed stressed. I'm afriad it put me off season 2. I suggest you watch the Girl Next Door at the cinema as this will give you a completely different view of annoying old Kim Bauer, and the Lost Boys might do the same job for Kiefer</p>
item.content:encoded: I know exactly what you mean Matthew. We had a real problem with season 1 being on Sunday evenings as we always ended the weekend going to bed stressed. I’m afriad it put me off season 2. I suggest you watch the Girl Next Door at the cinema as this will give you a completely different view of annoying old Kim Bauer, and the Lost Boys might do the same job for Kiefer
